scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:dev -w api" "npm run dev -w web"
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint -w api" "npm run lint -w web"
scripts.build: npm run prisma:generate && npm run web:generate && npm run build -w web && npm run build -w api
scripts.deploy: npm ci && npm run db:migrate:prod && npm run build && npm run pm2:restart
